Centennial.Orchard station (RTD): Orchard station is an island platformed RTD light rail station in Greenwood Village, Colorado, United States. Operating as part of the E, F and R lines, the station was opened on November 17, 2006, and is operated by the Regional Transportation District. The station features a public art installation of stamped concrete illustrating magnified apple leaves and stainless steel birds entitled Orchard Memory.
